content: {A笑眯眯}You're inviting me to move in? Thank you, yeep~. A few days ago, I had a premonition while stargazing... It told me my Planette would be connected with yours.
{A思考星光}Once you've picked a spot for me with the <style=Highlight>Building Kit</style>, I'll be on my way. Until then, I'd better head back to the Academia and pack up my book piles, yeep...
I'm sorting out the books and materials I must bring with me. {A思考星光}But... your planet doesn't seem to have a place for me yet, yeep?
{A疑惑}Live on your planet? Thank you kindly for inviting me, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>. But there are still journeys ahead of me, so... my apologies.
I wonder... are there any <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style> staff on your planet? Once I have a place to stay, I'll head over right away.
Could you help me find the staff of <style=Highlight>Loomi Co.</style>? Once I have a place to stay, I'll head over right away. Thanks for inviting~!
